body:
This PR includes the following changes:

- [x] Astropy 3 drops Python 3 support
- [x] Add latest version of Astropy that still supports Python 2
- [x] Add explicit version requirements for Python and NumPy
- [x] Make optional variants actually optional
- [x] Add additional external libraries that Astropy looks for
- [x] Build in parallel

Successfully builds on macOS 10.14.6 with Clang 10.0.1 and Python 3.7.4.
title: Add py-astropy 2.0.14
